name: stripe-connector
description: Stripe payment integration with charges, subscriptions, customers, and webhooks
author: Hermetic Labs

card.title: Stripe Connector
card.description: Payments with subscriptions, customers, and webhooks

summary.overview: Stripe payment integration with payment intents, subscription management, customer management, webhook handling, and invoice generation.
summary.exampleUseCase: Create payment intents for one-time charges, set up recurring subscriptions, manage customer payment methods, and handle webhook events for payment confirmations.
summary.whatMakesThisDifferent: Direct Stripe API access with built-in webhook signature verification. Pairs with PCI compliance for secure payment workflows. Subscription lifecycle events trigger EVE workflows.
